name: @session-hub/agent
description: Session Hub sidecar agent for LXC containers

scripts.bundle: npm run build && npm run bundle:cli && tar -czf agent-bundle.tar.gz dist cli package.json package-lock.json
scripts.bundle:cli: cd ../session-hub-cli && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../agent/cli && cp dist/session-hub ../agent/cli/session-hub && chmod +x ../agent/cli/session-hub
